pages.text: emana ekati prasrabana ya theke allahara bandagana [1] pana karabe, tara e prasrabanake yatheccha prabahita karabe
Tara manata purna kare [1] ebam se dinera bhaye kare, ye dinera akalyana habe byapaka
Ara tara mahabbata thaka sapekse [1] abhabagrasta, iyatima o bandike [2] khabara dana kare
ebam bale, ‘sudhu allahara sastusti labhera uddesye amara tomaderake khabara dana kari, amara tomadera kacha theke pratidana ca'i na, krtajnata'o naya
‘Niscaya amara asanka kari amadera rabera kacha theke eka bhitiprada bhayankara dinera.’
Pariname allah taderake raksa karabena se dinera anista hate ebam taderake pradana karabena hasyojjbalata o utphullata
Ara tadera sabarera [1] puraskarasbarupa tini taderake pradana karabena udyana o resami bastra
Sekhane tara helana diye asina thakabe susajjita asane, tara sekhane khuba garama athaba khuba sita dekhabe na
Ara tadera upara sannihita thakabe gachera chaya ebam tara phalamulera thokasamuha sampurnarupe tadera ayattadhina kara habe
Ara tadera upara ghure ghure paribesana kara habe raupyapatrae [1] ebam sphatika-saccha panapatre
rupara sphatika patrae [1], tara ta parimana karabe sampurna-parimitabhabe
Ara sekhane taderake pana karano habe yanajabila misraita purnapatra-paniya
jannatera emana eka prasrabanera, yara nama habe salasabila
Ara tadera upara pradaksina karabe cira kisoragana, yakhana apani taderake dekhabena takhana mane karabena tara yena biksipta mukta
Ara apani yakhana sekhane dekhabena, dekhate pabena sbacchandya ebam bisala rajya
Tadera abarana habe suksma sabuja resama o sthula resama, ara tara alankrta habe raupya nirmita kankane [1], ara tadera raba taderake pana karabena pabitra paniya
‘Niscaya eta tomadera puraskara; ara tomadera karmapracesta chila prasansayogya
Niscaya amara apanara prati kura'ana nayila karechi krame krame
Kaje'i apani dhairyera sathe apanara rabera nirdesera pratiksa karuna ebam tadera madhya theke kono papistha ba ghora akrtajna kaphirera anugatya karabena na
Ara apanara rabera nama smarana karuna sakale o sandhyaya
